p: Four strains were used in this study. In the case of C. jejuni, the reference strain (ATCC ® 33560 TM) and the chicken isolate (MT947450) were named CJ–RS and CJ–CI, respectively. In the case of C. coli, the reference strain (ATCC ® 33559 TM) and the chicken isolate (MT947451) were named CC–RS and CC–CI, respectively.
